entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Princeton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Princeton Airport 12:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: WSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Snow level rising to 1200 metres this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1300 metres near noon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
